name: Salted Caramel Apple Bars
author: Mott's
summary: This sweet, caramel apple snack bar with a hint of salt makes a great coffee break treat.
ingredients: 1 cup Mott's® Original or Cinnamon Applesauce
⅛ teaspoon coarse sea salt, or to taste**
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine flour, confectioners' sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon and nutmeg in a bowl
Cream butter in separate large bowl
Beat in egg, applesauce, and vanilla extract
Mix dry ingredients into wet ingredients
Add diced apples, caramel bits and walnuts; blend in thoroughly
Pour into greased pan and distribute evenly
Combine granulated sugar, cinnamon and sea salt for the topping
Sprinkle evenly on top of the batter
Bake until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean, 30-35 minutes
Cool completely and cut into 16 bars
